remarks: Formulating a partial extended sum over integers using the recursive sequence builder.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 18-Oct-2017.)
statement:
esumfzf.1 $e |- F/_ k F $.
esumfzf $p |- ( ( F : NN --> ( 0 [,] +oo ) /\ N e. NN ) -> sum* k e. ( 1 ... N ) ( F ` k ) = ( seq 1 ( +e , F ) ` N ) ) $.
$d N k $.
